attributes.action: Strip Robert Mugabe of his honorary Knight Commander of the Order of the Bath
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How can a man who clearly does not follow human rights still be allowed to retain a honorary Knight Commander of the Order of the Bath when the University of Edinburgh withdrew the degree awarded to him in 1984 surely it is time for the Government to act as orders are only given to those who deserve them

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
